title: Feeling Is the Secret
author: Neville Goddard
annotation: A short, foundational text on how feeling and assumption shape experience.
citation: Goddard, Neville. Feeling Is the Secret. 1944.

title: The Power of Awareness
author: Neville Goddard
annotation: Practical chapters on living from the wish fulfilled.
citation: Goddard, Neville. The Power of Awareness. 1952.

title: Ask and It Is Given
author: Esther & Jerry Hicks
annotation: A practical path for emotional guidance, alignment, and deliberate creation.
citation: Hicks, Esther and Jerry. Ask and It Is Given. 2004.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
annotation: Presence as a practice, not a mood. Quieting the compulsive mind.
citation: Tolle, Eckhart. The Power of Now. 1997.

title: Letter from Birmingham Jail
author: Martin Luther King Jr.
annotation: Moral clarity and rhetoric — power that doesn’t abandon love.
citation: King, Martin Luther Jr. Letter from Birmingham Jail. 1963.
